SummaryEnglish: We live in repetitive daily routines, and it is time to take a break to find the balance of our body and minds. To enjoy the summer vacation, the half-time of our lives, Yu Mi and Woo Shik go to spend a daily life in a new place. It’s a small village where the ocean spreads in the front yard and the sun shines warmly over you. They sometimes enjoy the moment by themselves or with their friends. It’s about eating healthily, working out, and looking back ourselves. Will you come to our house?

1.SummaryEnglish: Yu Mi and Woo Shik get to spend a month of summer vacation. They go to a small village in Gang Won Province to rest and find a new daily life. They are amazed to see the beautiful house with a garden full of various vegetables. On the second day of their vacation, their friend Park Seo Joon visit their place. Yu Mi and Woo Shik prepare a welcome drink and fruit for him and begin to cook a special meal.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yu Mi and Woo Shik prepare a special meal for Seo Joon. Yu Mi makes chicken curry with her own recipe, and Woo Shik cooks the scallops. They gather around and write diaries to remember the day. Seo Joon video calls his friend, and they show perfect chemistry. Early in the morning, Woo Shik makes breakfast for the others. In the afternoon, they go out to swim.

3.SummaryEnglish: After playing in the water and having food, Seo Joon gets ready to go back. Yu Mi and Woo Shik pluck some produce in the yard and give them to him as he leaves. Afterward, the two clean up and finish they day by writing in their diary. Next morning, they get up and start the morning with a healthy breakfast.

4.TitleEnglish: Yu Mi and Woo Shik Go Temple Stay
4.SummaryEnglish: Woo Shik goes to the marketplace alone to shop groceries. Yu Mi cooks mini tortillas and boiled pork. After enjoying a delicious meal, they start at-home training. They go to Hwaam Temple to do a temple stay. Everything is new to Yu Mi and Woo Shik, but they try their best to make a great memory. Meanwhile, Woo Shik invites two special friends to their house.

5.TitleEnglish: Lee Sun-kyun and Park Hee-soon Arrived
5.SummaryEnglish: Woo Shik and Yu Mi get back from the temple stay and enjoy a relaxing time in the afternoon. While Woo Shik is taking a nap, Yu Mi goes out and brings a surprising present for Woo Shik. Meanwhile, Lee Sun-kyun and Park Hee-soon visit the house to enjoy the vacation together. They look around the house and the village together. Before having dinner, they play table tennis.

6.TitleEnglish: Summer Night With Sun Kyun and Hee Soon
6.SummaryEnglish: Woo Shik and Yu Mi try making makgeolli from scratch. Sun Kyun and Hee Soon support them, but bees appear and make a scene. The four friends go out for a walk to see the sunset and enjoy the peaceful summer night. After the walk, they have a barbecue time with Sun Kyun’s kimchi stew. Sun Kyun shows off his cooking skills again in the morning with bean sprout soup.

7.TitleEnglish: Yu Mi and Woo Shik Go Surfing
7.SummaryEnglish: The friends enjoy the ocean and try paddleboarding. Hee Soon makes a special lunch for the friends, and Sun Kyun talks about his younger years. Yu Mi and Woo Shik prepare gifts for them to commemorate their vacation together. On a rainy day, Yu Mi and Woo Shik learn how to surf and meet new friends. It is their first time surfing, but they show off great skills.

8.TitleEnglish: New Friends Visit Yu Mi and Woo Shik
8.SummaryEnglish: New friends are visiting Yu Mi and Woo Shik. Woo Shik goes to a bakery to learn how to bake bread and scones. After learning the recipe, he prepares welcome bread for the guests. Yu Mi goes bike riding, but the rain starts to pour. So Hee and Yong Bin arrive to enjoy the vacation together. Woo Shik cooks pasta, and So Hee makes a salad for everyone. Stay tuned to check out!

9.TitleEnglish: A Summer Night With So Hee and Yong Bin
9.SummaryEnglish: Yu Mi and Woo Shik want the guests to enjoy the view of the neighborhood. Woo Shik and Yong Bin take a walk to the lighthouse and enjoy the beautiful scenery. Yu Mi and So Hee go grocery shopping and visit a cafe at the beach. For dinner, Yong Bin cooks sole, and So Hee makes stew and braised potatoes. Woo Shik prepares scallops that go well with wine, and everyone enjoys the summer night.

10.TitleEnglish: The Last Night of Summer Vacation
10.SummaryEnglish: Woo Shik cooks a special dish for Yu Mi and the guests. He tries cooking chicken biryani, but he struggles since it’s his first time making it. With Woo Shik’s dish, they go out for a picnic. They have a meal at the lighthouse and take photos to remember their summer vacation. Woo Shik and Yu Mi enjoy their last night at Goseong to the fullest. Stay tuned to check out!

11.SummaryEnglish: Yu Mi and Woo Shik go to the attic to check out what they have to enjoy on their vacation. Woo Shik shows off his musical talents, and Yu Mi learns how to play various instruments. The behind story of Woo Shik’s baking is revealed, and Yu Mi talks about her new habit. Meanwhile, Woo Shik goes to the editing room to make his video diary. Stay tuned to check out!
